properties.name: ocr4all.application.label
properties.description: ocr4all application label; the default value is 'ocr4all-app'.

properties.name: ocr4all.application.name
properties.description: ocr4all application name; the default value is 'ocr4all app'.

properties.name: ocr4all.application.charset
properties.description: ocr4all application charset: ISO_8859_1, US_ASCII, UTF_16 or UTF_8; the default value is UTF_8.

properties.name: ocr4all.application.date.format
properties.description: ocr4all application date format. It uses the date and time patterns as specified in the Java class java.text.SimpleDateFormat; the default value is 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'.

properties.name: ocr4all.application.locale.language
properties.description: ocr4all application language that conforms to the IETF BCP 47 syntax; the default value is 'en'.

properties.name: ocr4all.application.locale.region
properties.description: ocr4all application region that conforms to the IETF BCP 47 syntax.

properties.name: ocr4all.application.locale.script
properties.description: ocr4all application script that conforms to the IETF BCP 47 syntax.

properties.name: ocr4all.application.view.languages
properties.description: ocr4all application comma-separated list of view languages that conforms to the IETF BCP 47 syntax. Can be overridden by a command line switch. This is optional, the default values are 'en' and 'de'.

properties.name: ocr4all.application.monitor.interval
properties.description: ocr4all application file monitor interval. This is the amount of time in milliseconds to wait between checks of the file system. Minimun value is 1000. This is optional, the default value is 15000.

properties.name: ocr4all.application.security.groups.administrator
properties.description: ocr4all application administrator group. This is optional, the default value is admin.

properties.name: ocr4all.application.task.executor.pool.size.core
properties.description: ocr4all application task executor core pool size. This is optional, the default value is 5.

properties.name: ocr4all.application.task.executor.pool.size.max
properties.description: ocr4all application task executor max pool size. This is optional, the default value is 10.

properties.name: ocr4all.application.security.groups.coordinator
properties.description: ocr4all application coordinator group. This is optional, the default value is coord.

properties.name: ocr4all.application.security.administrator.create
properties.description: ocr4all application administrator create flag. True if the administrator user should be created, if it is non available. This is optional, the default value is false.

properties.name: ocr4all.application.security.administrator.login
properties.description: ocr4all application administrator login. This is optional, the default value is admin.

properties.name: ocr4all.application.security.administrator.password
properties.description: ocr4all application administrator password. This is optional, the default value is ocr4all.

properties.name: ocr4all.system.unix.command.docker
properties.description: ocr4all unix system command docker; the default value is '/usr/bin/docker'.

properties.name: ocr4all.system.unix.command.convert
properties.description: ocr4all unix system command convert; the default value is '/usr/bin/convert'.

properties.name: ocr4all.system.unix.command.identify
properties.description: ocr4all unix system command identify; the default value is '/usr/bin/identify'.

properties.name: ocr4all.system.mac.command.docker
properties.description: ocr4all mac system command docker; the default value is '/usr/local/bin/docker'.

properties.name: ocr4all.system.mac.command.convert
properties.description: ocr4all mac system command convert; the default value is '/opt/local/bin/convert'.

properties.name: ocr4all.system.mac.command.identify
properties.description: ocr4all mac system command identify; the default value is '/opt/local/bin/identify'.

properties.name: ocr4all.system.windows.command.docker
properties.description: ocr4all windows system command docker; the default value is 'C:/Program Files/Docker/docker.exe'.

properties.name: ocr4all.system.windows.command.convert
properties.description: ocr4all windows system command convert; the default value is 'C:/Program Files/ImageMagick-7.0.11/convert.exe'.

properties.name: ocr4all.system.windows.command.identify
properties.description: ocr4all windows system command identify; the default value is 'C:/Program Files/ImageMagick-7.0.11/identify.exe'.

properties.name: ocr4all.exchange.folder
properties.description: ocr4all exchange directory.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.folder
properties.description: ocr4all workspace directory.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.configuration.folder
properties.description: ocr4all workspace configuration folder; the default value is '.ocr4all'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.configuration.files.main
properties.description: ocr4all main workspace configuration file; the default value is 'ocr4all'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.configuration.files.user
properties.description: ocr4all user workspace configuration file; the default value is 'user'. Required in server profile.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.configuration.files.group
properties.description: ocr4all group workspace configuration file; the default value is 'group'. Required in server profile.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.configuration.files.password
properties.description: ocr4all password workspace configuration file; the default value is 'password'. Required in server profile.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.configuration.files.provider
properties.description: ocr4all service provider workspace configuration file; the default value is 'service-provider'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.models.folder
properties.description: ocr4all workspace models folder; the default value is 'models'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.models.model.configuration.folder
properties.description: ocr4all workspace model configuration folder; the default value is '.model'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.models.model.configuration.files.main
properties.description: ocr4all main workspace model configuration file; the default value is 'model'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.models.model.configuration.files.assembly
properties.description: ocr4all assembly workspace model configuration file; the default value is 'assembly'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.models.model.file
properties.description: ocr4all workspace model file; the default value is 'model'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.workflows.folder
properties.description: ocr4all workspace workflows folder; the default value is 'workflows'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.workflows.file.extension.metadata
properties.description: ocr4all workspace workflows file extension for metadata; the default value is '.metadata'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.workflows.file.extension.workflow
properties.description: ocr4all workspace workflows file extension for workflow; the default value is '.workflow'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.folder
properties.description: ocr4all workspace projects folder; the default value is 'projects'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.configuration.folder
properties.description: ocr4all workspace project configuration folder; the default value is '.project'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.configuration.files.main
properties.description: ocr4all main workspace project configuration file; the default value is 'project'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.configuration.files.security
properties.description: ocr4all main workspace project configuration file; the default value is 'security'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.configuration.files.folio
properties.description: ocr4all main workspace project configuration file; the default value is 'folio'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.configuration.files.history
properties.description: ocr4all main workspace project configuration file; the default value is 'history'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.images.folder
properties.description: ocr4all workspace project images folder; the default value is 'images'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.images.folios.folder
properties.description: ocr4all workspace project images folios folder; the default value is 'folios'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.images.derivatives.folder
properties.description: ocr4all workspace project images derivatives folder; the default value is 'derivatives'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.images.derivatives.format
properties.description: ocr4all workspace project images derivatives format. The format must be suitable for use on web pages (jpg, png); the default value is 'jpg'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.images.derivatives.quality.thumbnail.folder
properties.description: ocr4all workspace project images derivatives quality thumbnail folder; the default value is 'thumbnail'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.images.derivatives.quality.detail.folder
properties.description: ocr4all workspace project images derivatives quality detail folder; the default value is 'detail'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.images.derivatives.quality.best.folder
properties.description: ocr4all workspace project images derivatives quality best folder; the default value is 'best'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.models.folder
properties.description: ocr4all workspace project models folder; the default value is 'models'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.models.configuration.folder
properties.description: ocr4all workspace project models configuration folder; the default value is '.models'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.models.configuration.files.security
properties.description: ocr4all main workspace project models configuration file; the default value is 'security'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.models.model.configuration.folder
properties.description: ocr4all workspace project model configuration folder; the default value is '.model'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.models.model.configuration.files.main
properties.description: ocr4all main workspace project model configuration file; the default value is 'model'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.models.model.configuration.files.assembly
properties.description: ocr4all assembly workspace project model configuration file; the default value is 'assembly'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.models.model.file
properties.description: ocr4all workspace project model file; the default value is 'model'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.sandboxes.folder
properties.description: ocr4all workspace project sandboxes folder; the default value is 'sandboxes'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.sandboxes.sandbox.configuration.folder
properties.description: ocr4all workspace project sandbox configuration folder; the default value is '.sandbox'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.sandboxes.sandbox.configuration.files.main
properties.description: ocr4all main workspace project sandbox configuration main file; the default value is 'sandbox'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.sandboxes.sandbox.configuration.files.history
properties.description: ocr4all history workspace project sandbox configuration history file; the default value is 'history'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.sandboxes.sandbox.mets.file
properties.description: ocr4all workspace project sandbox mets file; the default value is 'mets.xml'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.sandboxes.sandbox.mets.group
properties.description: ocr4all workspace project sandbox mets group; the default value is 'ocr4all'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.sandboxes.sandbox.snapshots.folder
properties.description: ocr4all workspace project sandbox snapshots folder; the default value is 'snapshots'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.sandboxes.sandbox.snapshots.snapshot.configuration.folder
properties.description: ocr4all workspace project sandbox snapshot configuration folder; the default value is '.snapshot'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.sandboxes.sandbox.snapshots.snapshot.configuration.files.main
properties.description: ocr4all workspace project sandbox snapshot configuration main file; the default value is 'snapshot'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.sandboxes.sandbox.snapshots.snapshot.configuration.files.process
properties.description: ocr4all workspace project sandbox snapshot configuration process file; the default value is 'process'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.sandboxes.sandbox.snapshots.snapshot.sandbox.folder
properties.description: ocr4all workspace project sandbox snapshot sandbox folder; the default value is 'sandbox'.

properties.name: ocr4all.workspace.projects.project.sandboxes.sandbox.snapshots.snapshot.derived.folder
properties.description: ocr4all workspace project sandbox snapshot derived folder; the default value is 'derived'.

properties.name: ocr4all.opt.folder
properties.description: ocr4all opt directory.

properties.name: ocr4all.temporary.folder
properties.description: ocr4all temporary directory.

properties.name: ocr4all.temporary.prefix
properties.description: ocr4all prefix for temporary files/directories names; the default value is 'ocr4all-'.

properties.name: ocr4all.api.jwt.secret
properties.description: ocr4all api JWT access token secret. The default value is '--access token secret--'.

properties.name: ocr4all.api.jwt.issuer
properties.description: ocr4all api JWT access token issuer. The default issuer is 'ocr4all.org'.

properties.name: ocr4all.api.jwt.validity
properties.description: ocr4all api JWT access token validity time in milliseconds. The default value is one week (7 × 24 × 60 × 60 × 1000 = 604800000).

properties.name: ocr4all.api.documentation.source
properties.description: ocr4all api documentation source, this means, the base package name. The default value is 'de.uniwuerzburg.zpd.ocr4all.application.api'.

properties.name: ocr4all.api.documentation.title
properties.description: ocr4all api documentation title. The default value is 'OCR4all RESTful web API'.

properties.name: ocr4all.api.documentation.description
properties.description: ocr4all api documentation description. The default value is 'This is the official RESTful web API for OCR4all, a software for digitization of primarily very early printed documents'.

properties.name: ocr4all.api.documentation.version
properties.description: ocr4all api documentation version. The default value is '1.0'.

properties.name: ocr4all.api.documentation.contact.name
properties.description: ocr4all api documentation contact name. The default value is 'ocr4all'.

properties.name: ocr4all.api.documentation.contact.email
properties.description: ocr4all api documentation contact email. The default value is 'ocr4all@uni-wuerzburg.de'.

properties.name: ocr4all.api.documentation.license
properties.description: ocr4all api documentation license. The default value is 'MIT License'.

properties.name: ocr4all.api.documentation.url.tos
properties.description: ocr4all api documentation terms of service url. The default value is 'https://www.uni-wuerzburg.de/en/sonstiges/imprint-privacy-policy'.

properties.name: ocr4all.api.documentation.url.contact
properties.description: ocr4all api documentation contact url. The default value is 'http://www.ocr4all.org'.

properties.name: ocr4all.api.documentation.url.license
properties.description: ocr4all api documentation license url. The default value is 'https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT'.
